home.title: Custom rugs made to order
home.subtitle: From logos and sports fields to animal motifs and typography – we craft rugs to your exact brief, including custom sizes and materials.

about.title: About us
about.p1: We are a small workshop focused on bespoke rugs with precise craftsmanship.
about.p2: Our team helps you pick the right material, pile height and finishing to fit your space.
about.p3: Send us your sketch or moodboard — we’ll prepare a digital mockup and quotation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Tell us your idea. Add a drawing or reference image and specify sizes and preferred materials. We'll reply with a quotation.
contact.ok: Thank you! Your request has been sent.
contact.err: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How do I order a custom rug?
faq.a1: Use the contact form with your sizes, material preference and a reference image. We'll confirm feasibility and price.
faq.q2: What is the usual lead time?
faq.a2: Typically 2–6 weeks depending on complexity and material availability.
faq.a3: Yes. We ship EU-wide and worldwide with tracked delivery.
